traits.name: Demonic Ritual
entries: Brusipha can spend 3 hours performing a ritual that summons {@dice 1d3 + 1} barlguras or 1 hezrou. She must sacrifice a Medium or larger living creature to Baphomet during this ritual, and the ritual can be performed only at night. The demons vanish at dawn.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: Brusipha can perfectly recall any path she has traveled.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Brusipha makes two Eldritch Blast attacks.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast
entries: Ranged Spell atk +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) necrotic damage. If Brusipha moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before she hit, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from Brusipha and have the {@condition prone} condition.

actions.name: Incite the Hunters (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Brusipha allows each ally within 30 feet of herself that has the Unerring Tracker trait to make one weapon attack as a reaction against the target of that ally's Unerring Tracker.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Brusipha casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
